basics.name: Arnaud Caldow
basics.label: Senior Data Engineer
basics.summary: Senior Data Engineer with experience designing and scaling cloud-based data platforms across AWS, GCP, and Azure. Skilled in data pipeline orchestration, ETL development, and data lakehouse/warehouse solutions. Adept at mentoring engineers, leading tool migrations, and setting platform-wide standards while maintaining a high-level architectural vision to align technology with business needs.

work.name: Collibra
highlights: Mentored junior and mid-level data engineers, providing technical guidance and career support
Conducted technical and behavioral interviews for multiple engineering positions
Led migrations of key data tools, including orchestrator, ingestion platform, and cost estimation for a new data warehouse
Defined platform-wide standards and best practices for data engineering processes
Maintained a high-level architectural view of the platform, ensuring alignment and connectivity across systems

work.name: Collibra
highlights: Implemented the new pipeline orchestrating solution
Migrated 50+ data pipelines from the legacy orchestration tool
Coordinated with stakeholders to bring in new data sources into Collibra's Datalake
Published Data Engineering best practices for pipeline development within Data Mesh
Developed a library to use Data Quality tool within the orchestrator

work.name: Lucy In The Cloud (Micropole)
highlights: Implemented a Data Lakehouse facilitating data access and management for analysts
Developed an ETL solution to implement a fast track with Self-BI capabilities
Implemented a fully serverless ETL solution delivering data for API consumption
Collaborated with analytics team on ETL tasks ensuring data integrity
Designed Jenkins pipeline to automate deployment of ETL scripts on AWS
Implemented pub/sub solution for API messages with unique ID and classification
Built a big data serverless ETL solution to process large transactional files and expose them in a Data Warehouse
